clues.response: Brown vs. the Board of Education

clues.text: His remains are interred at the University of Louisville Law School, not at the Mass. school named for him

rounds.text: In a 1906 speech Teddy Roosevelt said he agreed with their aims but their methods were sensational & irresponsible
